zh-Hant.member_wolf_desc: 熱愛美食與發呆，是嘎豬窩的創始狼！語助詞是「嘎！」
zh-Hant.member_pig_desc: 阿狼的妹妹，不會講話，但是可以用念力跟阿狼溝通。
zh-Hant.member_bo_nickname: 綽號：昂藍波、灰塵、大老鼠
zh-Hant.member_bo_desc: 會用眼神殺死主人的英短，是阿狼的好朋友（兼坐騎？）。
zh-Hant.member_chicken_desc: 原本住在老媽學姊家，後來招兵買馬來的
zh-Hant.footer_copyright: © 2025 嘎豬窩. 保留所有權利。
zh-Hant.search_result_title_with_keyword: 總共搜尋到{n}篇{keyword}相關熱門文章
zh-Hant.search_result_title_without_keyword: 總共搜尋到{n}篇熱門文章
zh-Hant.blog_2507271_title: 老媽的師證成功路──快樂建築在別人痛苦上的慶祝
zh-Hant.blog_2507271_summary: 這是一段關於堅持與努力的故事，偶老媽在特殊的環境與挑戰中，完成一件看似不可能的任務。背後的心路歷程和獨特的慶祝方式，讓偶忍不住好奇她到底經歷了什麼，以及這段經歷如何影響她和身邊的人。
zh-Hant.blog_2507241_title: 偶的狼生第一場演唱會！頑童現場太炸太辣🔥
zh-Hant.blog_2507241_summary: 那晚不只是看表演，而是被音樂狠狠撞進心裡 嘎。第一次演唱會就遇上這樣的場面，每一首歌都讓全場共鳴，震撼難忘。如果你也愛看辣妹，你一定會想親身感受。
zh-Hant.blog_2507191_title: 排隊也甘願！這碗牛丼讓偶繞一圈回來吃爆！
zh-Hant.blog_2507191_summary: 一間原本沒計畫造訪的小店，卻因為老媽肚子叫得像震天雷，成了此行的驚喜發現。人潮絡繹不絕，它到底有什麼魅力？讓偶們一起揭曉 嘎
zh-Hant.blog_2507181_title: 爸指定要來，媽指定不吃：特殊餐廳的家庭攻防戰！
zh-Hant.blog_2507181_summary: 位於涉谷Parco的一間神祕餐廳，被老爸欽點為必訪之地，究竟是什麼樣的地方，讓偶們這一家行前就氣氛緊繃？這趟旅程，絕對不只是吃那麼簡單──
zh-Hant.blog_2507171_title: 甜點滿分、榻榻米缺席沒關係—「沒預約也能吃好喝滿」的佛系自信
zh-Hant.blog_2507171_summary: 沒有計畫的午後，反而遇見剛剛好的風景與味道。一間店、一隻狼、一縷木香、一杯咖啡，也許剛好是你想逃離塵囂的入口。今天的偶是文青狼狼。
zh-Hant.blog_2507091_title: 中藥入可樂？這瓶有點辣、有點野啊！
zh-Hant.blog_2507091_summary: 這瓶在涉谷的神秘可樂，風味真滴意想不到。一入口的感受、尾韻的變化，居然連偶都抵擋不住他的魅力？到底是什麼味道，跟上偶的腳步一探究竟吧！
zh-Hant.blog_2507061_title: CHAVATY冰一波：焙茶濃、白桃清，嘎嘎好吃
zh-Hant.blog_2507061_summary: 藏身在表參道巷弄裡的 CHAVATY，外觀看起來低調，人潮卻一點都不低調！到底這家網紅甜點店是實力派還是純靠顏值？吃完會升天還是想喊退款？請繼續看狼吞虎嚥ㄟ食記！
zh-Hant.blog_2507051_title: 藍波三歲生日快樂！出走王終於服刑期滿？
zh-Hant.blog_2507051_summary: 今天是藍波的三歲生日🎉雖然他因為太愛離家出走，最近被關進外役監反省貓生，但他依然是偶們家最幸福、最有戲的仔。想知道藍波的願望有多有趣？趕緊點進來一起慶生吧！
zh-Hant.blog_2507031_title: 台灣冰淇淋比較濃，親戚猴仔沒偶萌嘎
zh-Hant.blog_2507031_summary: 一場看似平凡的 IKEA 探親之旅，卻意外遇見一位和自己「長得超像」的猴仔？再加上一球讓人疑問的冰淇淋味道對比，讓人不禁想問：到底發生了什麼事？嘎～
zh-Hant.blog_2507021_title: 比清酒樽更狂的收藏？來偶家驗貨！
zh-Hant.blog_2507021_summary: 雖說明治神宮的清酒樽牆很吸睛，但偶叔叔收藏的酒樽多到可以開展覽，來偶家拍照才是真內行！來看偶家的清酒牆～
zh-Hant.blog_2506291_title: 神聖的夫妻樹和偶的水餃幻想
zh-Hant.blog_2506291_summary: 在明治神宮見證神聖婚禮，眼前的夫婦楠讓人心生敬意——但某狼的腦袋裡，竟然只浮現水餃和國泰人壽？
zh-Hant.blog_2506281_title: 食品展不是吃喝，是搶拍美賊賊的畫面！
zh-Hant.blog_2506281_summary: 這次在臺北國際食品展，大家忙著品嚐美食，偶卻只有一個目標──跟漂亮的賊賊拍照！但老媽卻悄悄逼近，氣氛瞬間緊張起來。究竟接下來會發生什麼趣事？快跟著偶一起揭開這場食品展的狼式大冒險！
zh-Hant.blog_2506211_title: 小夜燈亮起，貓警長報到🐾 向辛苦的守護者致敬！
zh-Hant.blog_2506211_summary: 一年一度的警察節來啦！這次新竹市警察局特地設計兩款超~~~~可愛（跟偶一樣）又溫暖的禮物，向默默守護大家的警察們致敬～想知道是什麼？一起來開箱吧！
zh-Hant.blog_2506191_title: 狼出沒！在明治神宮偷個東京小午覺
zh-Hant.blog_2506191_summary: 走進明治神宮，穿過壯觀鳥居後竟是意外清涼的綠色秘境！不只適合參拜，還能慢跑、散步、放空，甚至讓狼狼想直接躺下小睡一場。東京竟藏有這樣的療癒角落？一探究竟吧！
zh-Hant.blog_2506181_title: 老爸說要把偶丟下去餵天鵝，偶只想坐船啊！（淚）
zh-Hant.blog_2506181_summary: 在東京上野恩賜公園，狼本想悠閒坐天鵝船，卻意外被老爸威脅要丟去餵天鵝！？這趟賞花遊湖的輕旅行，怎麼變成驚險搞笑的親子鬥智記？#狼出沒，絕對超展開！
zh-Hant.blog_2506172_title: 上野駅 → 躺好才有力氣冒險
zh-Hant.blog_2506172_summary: 在媽媽熱情規劃行程的同時，狼狼只想找個地方先躺平充電。旅行才剛開始，體力卻已亮紅燈──究竟下一站會發生什麼事？#狼出沒｜上野駅 等你來看！
zh-Hant.blog_2506171_title: 抹茶七級跳！壽々喜園NO.7濃到狼狼的心都綠了～
zh-Hant.blog_2506171_summary: 當地人氣超高的壽々喜園抹茶冰淇淋店，擁有七段濃度選擇，最強NO.7茶香濃郁卻不苦澀，吸引眾多抹茶控排隊朝聖！到底有多好吃？爸媽竟貪吃到忘記幫偶拍照？！
zh-Hant.blog_2506161_title: 老偉士×手沖咖啡 市場裡的一杯人情味
zh-Hant.blog_2506161_summary: 嘎～在熱鬧的傳統市場裡，一台老偉士牌與一位年輕老闆，假日限定現身，只為沖出一杯有溫度的咖啡。沒有華麗裝潢，只有真誠與香氣，等待你各位停下腳步發現…
zh-Hant.blog_2506081_title: 被泥鰍鍋嚇怕了？炸肉餅一口秒回魂，保證多汁又爽口！
zh-Hant.blog_2506081_summary: 淺草超人氣炸肉餅，排隊雖長但取餐超快，肉餅多汁搭配洋蔥清爽可口，讓狼狼一試難忘。狼鴿爭食的用餐體驗，更是難以忘懷，快來嚐嚐這份藏在巷弄裡的美味！
zh-Hant.blog_2506071_title: 鯨魚湯鹹到想哭，泥鰍鍋還是有愛—駒形どぜう奇葩美食開箱
zh-Hant.blog_2506071_summary: 猶豫很久，狼狼終於踏進駒形どぜう，這家店提供獨特的泥鰍鍋體驗，搭配甜蔥和特製醬油高湯，環境舒適且富日式風情。但鯨魚味噌湯鹹度挑戰味蕾，整體滋味讓狼狼既驚喜又好奇，值得一試！
zh-Hant.blog_2506062_title: 布丁控必試！淺草人氣絲滑布丁與驚豔哈味分享
zh-Hant.blog_2506062_summary: 淺草這家小店雖不起眼，卻藏著滑順濃郁的絲滑布丁和季節限定哈密瓜口味。天然哈味讓人驚艷，焦糖奶香完美融合，值得一試！快來看看狼狼推薦，讓味蕾開心一整天！
zh-Hant.blog_2506061_title: 巨型菠蘿vs鴿子大軍 朝聖淺草の人氣點心！
zh-Hant.blog_2506061_summary: 在淺草人氣排隊名店花月堂，一早就能買到超巨型的酥脆菠蘿麵包！還有意外登場的胖胖鴿子大軍，快跟偶一探究竟！
zh-Hant.blog_2506051_title: Fuglen Asakusa 咖啡札記：Caffé Latte 酸而順口
zh-Hant.blog_2506051_summary: 這次狼狼跑咖到 Fuglen Asakusa ，你各位啊！如果偏愛酸香型咖啡，值得一試；但若想探索更多風味，請跟著繼續翻開菜單下頁！
zh-Hant.blog_2506041_title: 早起的狼兒有椅子坐 爽啦～
zh-Hant.blog_2506041_summary: 走在淺草的路上雖然興奮，但也粉累，幸運找到可以坐的公園椅，讓偶的小粗腿可以稍微鬆一下
zh-Hant.blog_2506031_title: 跟偶相同配色的寺廟耶！算它有眼光 嘎😎
zh-Hant.blog_2506031_summary: 一下灰機，就被老爸老媽抓去淺草寺參拜，啊店家都沒開，很沒有熱鬧的感覺餒。不過偶相信他有藝術天份，配色跟偶的衣服一樣，懂穿 嘎～
zh-Hant.blog_2506021_title: 驚！凱蒂其實是偶家的超級遠親？
zh-Hant.blog_2506021_summary: 在機場巧遇哈小姐們，她們居然知道嘎豬窩的王藍波，好扯啊！居然比偶有名！究竟為何哈小姐們知道王藍波，讓偶們一起看下去
zh-Hant.blog_2506011_title: 夜航初體驗：灰高高 睡搞搞
zh-Hant.blog_2506011_summary: 期待已久的東京遊終於啟程啦～睡飽才有力氣玩！別說了～跟偶一起進入夢鄉吧
zh-Hant.blog_2505201_title: 收到詐騙訊息？阿狼教你冷靜＋查證＋報警三原則
zh-Hant.blog_2505201_summary: 「阿狼ㄟ反詐小學堂」教你面對詐騙訊息時，不慌不忙、三思而後行！從「冷靜」、「查證」到「報警」，偶用生活化幽默、暖心情節，幫你輕鬆掌握防詐關鍵，讓你在遇到詐騙時也能顧好自己、安全無虞啦。
zh-Hant.blog_2505191_title: 今天威力彩開出6億頭獎，快來沾沾喜氣吧！
zh-Hant.blog_2505191_summary: 5月19日威力彩連24期槓龜，頭獎金額累積至約 6.1 億元，你各位啊～還不快來試試手氣
zh-Hant.blog_2505171_title: 披薩店裡遇見兩隻企鵝，偶開始懷疑狼生🤯
zh-Hant.blog_2505171_summary: 今天和姨姨一起吃披薩時，意外發現隔壁桌竟然有兩隻企鵝也來「粗飯」！這奇妙的畫面讓偶開始懷疑，未來人類是否真的會被偶等大民族取代哩？一起來看看這瘋狂又有趣的故事吧！
zh-Hant.blog_2505101_title: 今天跟曾老師學伸展，回家想教波波結果…
zh-Hant.blog_2505101_summary: 今天偶擔任曾老師的小助教，學會雞肉伸展的方法，回家還想教昂藍波，結果發現他早已掌握，讓我忍不住驚呼：「嘎，那ㄟ安內！」想知道花生什麼素嗎？快來看看吧！
zh-Hant.blog_2505091_title: 臺北蛋糕孝心路，怎麼老媽這麼火大？
zh-Hant.blog_2505091_summary: 母親節帶著滿滿心意從臺北帶蛋糕肥家，沒想到老媽竟然灰常生氣。這段意外的母親節故事，請讓偶娓娓道來
zh-Hant.blog_2505013_title: 奔跑吧狼狼！魯普雷希特噴泉大逃亡🏃‍♂️💨
zh-Hant.blog_2505013_summary: 旅程來到尾聲，卻意外上演一場「狼狼逃水記」！偶阿嬤竟提議把偶丟進噴泉洗澡！？幸好偶反應快，才沒變成落湯狼——想知道偶怎麼逃過這場危機嗎？跟偶一起逃出升天吧！
zh-Hant.blog_2505012_title: 今天偶不當狼狼，偶當回夢幻溫泉美狼魚～
zh-Hant.blog_2505012_summary: 在捷克溫泉小鎮的迴廊欄杆邊，一隻狼靜靜坐著，幻想自己是優雅的美人魚。泡湯、做夢、出逃日常，這隻「美狼魚」的旅程可不只是可愛那麼簡單……
zh-Hant.blog_2505011_title: 酒鬼叔叔的夢幻逸品：如狗市面有這容量，偶家直接變酒窖
zh-Hant.blog_2505011_summary: 偶叔叔超愛喝酒，幸好市面沒有像Becherovka Likeur賣這麼大容量的，不然家裡可能早變酒窖！

en.member_wolf_desc: Loves food and daydreaming, the founding wolf of WPC! His catchphrase is 'Ga!'
en.member_pig_desc: Wolf's younger sister, doesn't speak, but can communicate with Wolf telepathically.
en.member_bo_nickname: Nicknames: Ang Rambo, Dusty, Big Rat
en.member_bo_desc: A British Shorthair who can kill his owner with his eyes, Wolf's good friend (and ride?).
en.member_chicken_desc: Originally lived at Mom's friend's house, then recruited to join.
en.blog_2507271_title: 老媽的師證成功路──快樂建築在別人痛苦上的慶祝
en.blog_2507271_summary: 這是一段關於堅持與努力的故事，偶老媽在特殊的環境與挑戰中，完成一件看似不可能的任務。背後的心路歷程和獨特的慶祝方式，讓偶忍不住好奇她到底經歷了什麼，以及這段經歷如何影響她和身邊的人。
en.blog_2507241_title: 偶的狼生第一場演唱會！頑童現場太炸太辣🔥
en.blog_2507241_summary: 那晚不只是看表演，而是被音樂狠狠撞進心裡 嘎。第一次演唱會就遇上這樣的場面，每一首歌都讓全場共鳴，震撼難忘。如果你也是樂迷，這段現場故事你一定會想親身感受。
en.blog_2507191_title: 排隊也甘願！這碗牛丼讓偶繞一圈回來吃爆！
en.blog_2507191_summary: 一間原本沒計畫造訪的小店，卻因為老媽肚子叫得像震天雷，成了此行的驚喜發現。人潮絡繹不絕，它到底有什麼魅力？讓偶們一起揭曉 嘎
en.blog_2507181_title: Dad’s gotta come, Mom’s gotta skip: The ultimate family food showdown at that quirky restaurant!
en.blog_2507181_summary: There's this mysterious little joint tucked inside Shibuya Parco, personally handpicked by Dad as a must-visit. But seriously, what kind of place is this that got our whole fam all tense before we even showed up? Trust me, this trip is way more than just grabbing a bite—it's an adventure!
en.blog_2507171_title: Desserts score a perfect 10, no tatami mats? No biggie — chill vibes and zero reservations, but still eating and drinking like a boss!
en.blog_2507171_summary: No plans this afternoon, but bam! Perfect vibes and tastes just popped up. One quirky café, one sneaky wolf (that’s me), a puff of cozy wood smoke, and a cup of magic coffee—maybe this is your sneaky backdoor outta the crazy city noise. Today, I’m officially a hipster wolf on the prowl.
en.blog_2507091_title: Herbal Cola? This Bottle’s Got a Spicy, Wild Kick!
en.blog_2507091_summary: This mysterious cola in Shibuya tastes nothing like you’d expect. From the first zing to the afterglow, even I can’t resist its charm! What’s the secret flavor? Follow me on this wild sip adventure!
en.blog_2507061_title: CHAVATY Ice Cream Hit Parade: Roasty Hojicha & White Peach — totally YUM!
en.blog_2507061_summary: Tucked away in the stylish alleys of Omotesando, CHAVATY might look all quiet and classy on the outside—but the crowd? Total chaos (in a good way)! So here’s the million-yen question: is this Insta-famous dessert spot actually worth the hype, or just riding on its pretty face? Will these scoops send us to foodie heaven—or straight to refund town? Stick around and find out in our foodie adventure!
en.blog_2507051_title: 🎉 Happy 3rd birthday, Bobo! So the runaway king has finally finished serving his sentence, huh? 😆
en.blog_2507051_summary: It’s Bobo’s 3rd birthday today! Even though he’s been doing some serious soul-searching in “cat rehab” lately—thanks to his habit of running away—he’s still the most dramatic (and pampered) star of our family. Curious about what hilarious wish Bobo made this year? Click in and join the party!
en.blog_2507031_title: Taiwanese ice cream is way creamier—plus, cousin monkey’s got nothing on my cuteness!
en.blog_2507031_summary: It started as a simple visit to IKEA… until I ran into a monkey that looked exactly like me?! Add in a mystery scoop of ice cream with a questionable flavor, and suddenly things got weird. What on earth is going on? Gaaaa~
en.blog_2507021_title: Move over sake barrels—check out my insane collection! Wanna verify? Come inspect it at my place!
en.blog_2507021_summary: Sure, the sake barrel wall at Meiji Shrine is cool and all, but my uncle’s collection? Massive enough to launch a full-blown exhibit. The real pros come take pics with our sake wall. Come on over and say “cheese!”
en.blog_2506291_title: The sacred couple trees… and my dumpling daydream
en.blog_2506291_summary: Witnessing a wedding at Meiji Shrine, standing before the awe-inspiring sacred couple trees—so solemn, so majestic… and yet, all I could think about was dumplings and Cathay Life Insurance?! What's wrong with me?!
en.blog_2506281_title: Taipei Food show? More like a mission to snap pics with pretty sisters!
en.blog_2506281_summary: While everyone at the Taipei International Food Show was busy munching and sipping, I had just one goal—getting a photo with a gorgeous sister! But just when I struck a pose, MOM sneaks up like a ninja. Tension’s in the air! What happens next in this wild wolfy expo adventure? Stick with me to find out!
en.blog_2506211_title: When the night light glows... Meow! Chief Kitty's on duty! 🐾 Saluting our hardworking heroes in blue!
en.blog_2506211_summary: It’s that time of the year again—Taiwan Police Day is here! This year, the Hsinchu City Police Bureau has cooked up not one, but two suuuperrrr cute (just like me) and heartwarming gifts to honor our silent guardians. Curious what they are? Let’s unbox together! 🎁🐾
en.blog_2506191_title: Wolf on the loose! Sneaking a sneaky little nap at Meiji Shrine in Tokyo 🐺💤
en.blog_2506191_summary: Step into Meiji Shrine, and BAM! After passing that epic torii gate, you're suddenly in a breezy green wonderland! Not just for prayers—this place is perfect for jogging, strolling, zoning out… or if you're a sleepy wolf like me, plopping down for a quick nap. Who knew Tokyo was hiding such a magical chill-out spot? Let’s go sniff it out!
en.blog_2506181_title: Dad Threatened to Toss Me to Feed Swans, But All I Wanted Was a Boat Ride! (Tears)
en.blog_2506181_summary: At Ueno Park, I dreamed of a chill swan boat cruise—until Dad threatened to toss me in as swan bait!? This flower-viewing adventure turned into a parent-kid showdown. #WolfOnTheLoose—Brace yourself!
en.blog_2506172_title: Ueno Station → Gotta Lie Down Before I Can Adventure
en.blog_2506172_summary: While Mom’s got the itinerary pumped, I’m just hunting for a spot to crash and recharge. Trip’s barely started and I’m already on empty—what’s next? #WolfOnTheLoose at Ueno Station—Stay tuned!
en.blog_2506171_title: Matcha Level 7! Suzukien’s NO.7 Turned My Heart Bright Green~
en.blog_2506171_summary: Suzukien’s matcha shop boasts 7 intensity levels—NO.7 packs a hearty tea punch without the bitterness, drawing die-hards in droves! So good my parents forgot to snap my pic. Want a taste test? Let’s go!
en.blog_2506161_title: Old Vespa × Pour-Over Coffee: A Cup of Warmth at the Market
en.blog_2506161_summary: In the bustling market, an old Vespa and a young barista team up on weekends to brew coffee with heart. No fancy decor—just genuine warmth and aroma. Ready to pause and sip?
en.blog_2506081_title: Scared of Loach Stew? Juicy Meat Patties Bring You Back in a Bite!
en.blog_2506081_summary: Asakusa’s famed fried meat patties might have a long queue, but service is lightning-fast. Juicy patties with crisp onions = flavor fireworks! Pigeons vs. me for scraps? Epic dining story, anyone?!
en.blog_2506071_title: Whale Soup So Salty It Brought Tears—Yet Loach Stew Steals My Heart! Dozeu Delights Unboxed
en.blog_2506071_summary: I hesitated, but finally entered Dozeu for its quirky loach hotpot with sweet onions & special soy broth. Cozy vibes, full Japanese flair. That whale miso soup? Salt attack! But this place is a must-try for the adventurous foodie.
en.blog_2506062_title: Pudding Obsessives, Rejoice! Asakusa’s Silky Custard & Melon Magic
en.blog_2506062_summary: This unassuming Asakusa shop hides a luxuriously smooth pudding and a seasonal melon twist. That natural melon punch + caramel cream? Mind-blowing. Trust my taste buds—come taste the joy!
en.blog_2506061_title: Giant Pineapple Buns vs. Pigeon Army: Pilgrimage to Asakusa’s Iconic Treat!
en.blog_2506061_summary: At Asakusa’s famed Kagetsudo, you can snag colossal crunchy pineapple buns first thing! Plus, a surprise flock of chubby pigeons—ready for the spectacle?
en.blog_2506051_title: Fuglen Asakusa Coffee Notes: A Zesty, Smooth Caffé Latte
en.blog_2506051_summary: I hopped over to Fuglen Asakusa! Fans of bright, acidic coffee—this caffé latte’s for you. Craving more flavor adventures? Keep flipping that menu!
en.blog_2506041_title: Early Wolf Gets the Chair—Pure Bliss!
en.blog_2506041_summary: Running around Asakusa is thrilling but tiring. Lucky me found a park bench to give my chubby legs a breather. Ahh, sweet relief!
en.blog_2506031_title: Temple Matching My Outfit—They’ve Got Style! Gah 😎
en.blog_2506031_summary: Stepped off the plane and Mom & Dad dragged me to Sensoji Temple—shops were closed, so no hustle-bustle. But hey, the temple’s color game matched my fit. Fashion forward? I think so! Gah~
en.blog_2506021_title: Shock! Kitty’s Actually My Super Distant Cousin?
en.blog_2506021_summary: Ran into the Hello Kitties at the airport—they knew about Lanbo from Squiggle Pig Nest? Wild! They’re more famous than me! How did they even hear of Lanbo? Let’s dive in!
en.blog_2506011_title: First Red-Eye Flight: Grey & Groggy Dream Mission
en.blog_2506011_summary: The long-awaited Tokyo trip finally kicked off—gotta catch those Zzz’s for peak play power! Enough talk—let’s drift into dreamland together!
en.blog_2505201_title: Scam Alert? Wolf’s 3 Golden Rules: Stay Calm, Verify, & Report!
en.blog_2505201_summary: Wolf’s Anti-Scam Academy shows you how to handle fraud messages without panic—think twice! From Stay Calm to Fact-Check to Report, I sprinkle humor and warmth to keep you safe and savvy!
en.blog_2505191_title: Power Lottery Hit $600M Today—Come Grab Some Luck!
en.blog_2505191_summary: After 24 straight no-jackpot rounds, May 19th’s Power Lottery jackpot soared to about $610M. You all gotta try your luck now!
en.blog_2505171_title: Met Two Penguins at the Pizzeria—Now I’m Questioning My Wolf Life! 🤯
en.blog_2505171_summary: Having pizza with Auntie when I spotted TWO penguins at the next table munching away! Mind blown—are wolves gonna rule the world? Let’s unravel this wacky, feathery adventure!
en.blog_2505101_title: Learned Stretches with Teacher Tseng—Tried Showing Lanbo…Oops!
en.blog_2505101_summary: I was Teacher Tseng’s little assistant today, learning the ‘chicken stretch’. Tried teaching Lanbo at home—turns out he already nailed it! I couldn’t help blurting, “Gah, how’d you learn that?” Wanna know the scoop? Dive in!
en.blog_2505091_title: Cake Pilgrimage from Taipei—Why’s Mom So Mad?!
en.blog_2505091_summary: Mother’s Day mission: bring heartfelt cakes from Taipei. Instead, Mom was furious! Curious how this birthday bungle unfolded? Let me spin the tale!
en.blog_2505013_title: Run, Wolf, Run! The Great Escape from the Rupprecht Fountain 🏃‍♂️💨
en.blog_2505013_summary: Trip’s finale turned into a ‘Wolf vs. Fountain’ saga! Grandma suggested tossing me into the Rupprecht Fountain for a ‘wash’!? Good reflexes saved me from a soggy fate—wanna know how I escaped? Let’s dash!
en.blog_2505012_title: Today I’m Not a Wolf—I’m a Dreamy Spa Mermaid Wolf~
en.blog_2505012_summary: In the Czech spa town’s colonnade, I sat dreaming I was a graceful mermaid wolf. Soak, dream, wander—this ‘merwolf’ adventure is more than just cute…
en.blog_2505011_title: Drunk Uncle’s Dream Gear: If Becherovka Came This Big, My House Would Be a Cellar
en.blog_2505011_summary: My uncle loves booze so much—thank goodness there’s no massive Becherovka bottles on the market, or we’d need a wine cellar at home!
